_meanings:
{@--2@} Weakness of, or
running at, the eyes.

{@--3@} Great 
increase or enlargement, surplus, 
excess, superfluous portion;  
{#svargABizyaMdavamanaM kftvevopaniveSitaM#} ({#ozaDiprasTaM#})
<ls>Ku. 6. 37</ls> by drawing off the 
surplus population {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} by emigration
({#aBizyaMdaH atirekaH atiriktajana iti yAvat#}
{#tasya vamanaM niHsAraRaM kftvA sTitamiva#}); <ab>cf.</ab> also
<ls>R. 15. 29</ls> Hemacandra's remarks
thereon.
